scripts.test: npm run lint-lib && npm run lint-test && npm run test-ci
scripts.test-ci: major=$(node --version | cut -b 2-2) && minor=$(node --version | cut -b 4-5) && if [ $major -eq 0 ] && [ $minor -ge 12 ]; then mocha --harmony --recursive test/; elif [ $major -ge 1 ]; then mocha --recursive test/; else mocha test/ test/flow/ test/consumer/express/ test/consumer/hapi/; fi
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover _mocha test/ test/flow/ test/consumer/express/ test/consumer/hapi/
scripts.lint-lib: eslint lib/ && echo Lint lib passed
scripts.lint-test: eslint --config test/.eslintrc test/ && echo Lint test passed
